commit.message:
Run MinIO server in distributed mode for functional tests.

This enables to run almost all functional tests for verification.

nodes.bodyText: Add the @Override annotation, and change the implementation to call emptyIfNull() if you accept my suggestion in ListObjectsResult

Add the @Override annotation, and change the implementation to call emptyIfNull() if you accept my suggestion in ListObjectsResult

commit.message:
Add method to return empty list if null

Added in the base class `ListObjectsResult` so that the implementations
of `contents()` in subclasses can be simplified.
